articles.author: Kevin Williams
articles.title: The Biggest Victim Of Europe's Anti-China EV Tariffs: The Mini Cooper - InsideEVs
articles.description: The Great Wall Motors-produced Mini Cooper Electric will be subject to the maximum 38.1% tariff.
articles.content: The European Union has thrown its hat in the China trade war gauntlet, but its not clear if this will play out exactly in Europe's favor. According to a report from Reuters, BMW, of all automakers, s… [+3524 chars]
